thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Green Plains Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.99

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Green Plains Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.99
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Green Plains Inc:
* GREEN PLAINS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.99 * Q4 REVENUE $921 MILLION VERSUS $932.1 MILLION * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.86 EXCLUDING ITEMS * ‍INCOME TAX BENEFIT OF $63.9 MILLION WAS RECORDED IN Q4 OF 2017​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.21, REVENUE VIEW $944.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍EXPECT TO OFFER INTEREST IN BEAUMONT TO PARTNERSHIP IN NEXT 120 DAYS​
* ‍DOMESTIC ETHANOL DEMAND SHOULD BE “POSITIVELY” IMPACTED BY EXPANDING BLENDS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
